welcome.description: At The Cozy Griddle, warm and comforting breakfast and lunch favorites are served all day in a relaxed, inviting atmosphere on Coursey Boulevard.
welcome.description2: Enjoy signature griddle cakes, build‑your‑own omelets, breakfast bowls, shrimp & grits, and hearty steak croissant platters. Don’t miss our red beans & rice lunch special on Mondays!
welcome.description3: Everything is cooked to order with fresh ingredients, generous portions, and a friendly neighborhood vibe.

aboutussection.aboutus: Founded by Baton Rouge native Tarick Johnson, drawing on family’s catering legacy (SYI), The Cozy Griddle offers a modern breakfast concept rooted in comforting traditions.
aboutussection.aboutus2: Located in a bright, butter‑yellow space inspired by his grandmother’s favorite color, the menu features all‑day breakfast, biscuits, pancakes, omelets and weekday lunch specials like red beans & rice.

contact.address: 11445 Coursey Blvd, Suite C, Baton Rouge, LA 70816
